sentences.en: A mirage is an optical Illusionfounded on waves of heat.
sentences.cn: 海市蜃楼是由大气热浪潮产生的一种光学幻觉.

sentences.en: A mirage is not a real object.
All everything is a mirage of my own thinking.
sentences.cn: 一切的一切,可能是我自己的痴心妄想!

sentences.en: Although the morning was young, the hazy mirage was up.
sentences.cn: 天色虽早, 朦胧的海市蜃楼却已经出现.

sentences.en: Are you having the same mirage I'm having?
sentences.cn: 你也和我一样,看到海市蜃楼了 吗 ?

sentences.en: His idea of love was a mirage.
Home's assessment now was that a cease - fire in place was a mirage.
sentences.cn: 霍姆现在认为就地 停火 纯属空中楼阁.

sentences.en: In a mirage the desert will mimic a lake.
sentences.cn: 在海市蜃楼中,沙漠有时会现出湖泊的形象.

sentences.en: It hovered before his eyes like the mirage of an oasis.
sentences.cn: 它在他眼前晃动，好像海市蜃楼里的绿洲。

sentences.en: Nine mad years of mirage and three long years of despair!
sentences.cn: 九个海市蜃楼的疯狂春秋换来漫长三年的绝望!

sentences.en: Our honeymoon was two days in Las Vegas at a luxurious hotel called Le Mirage.
sentences.cn: 我们的蜜月是在拉斯维加斯一家名为“海市蜃楼”的豪华酒店住了两天。

sentences.en: Perhaps we are just chasing a mirage.
sentences.cn: 也许我们只是在追逐一个梦。

sentences.en: Some people, all just a mirage, the beautiful illusion of his love.
sentences.cn: 有些人, 终究只是一场[海市蜃楼], 美丽了自己对爱情的幻想.

sentences.en: The blossoms of life are only a mirage.
sentences.cn: 生命之花,只是一种空幻.

sentences.en: The girl was a mirage, cast up by his troubled mind.
sentences.cn: 那个女孩是他的幻觉，是他那忧郁不安的头脑妄想出来的。

sentences.en: The objectivity of science is a mirage.
sentences.cn: 所谓科学的客观性是一种幻想。

trans.tran_en: an effect caused by hot air in a desert, which makes you think that you can see objects when they are not actually there
